actions.text: Amendment SA 229 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 57.

Amendment SA 229 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S2886, S2919; text: CR S2886) To express the sense of the Senate regarding Medicaid reconciliation legislation consistent with recommendations from the Secretary of Health and Human Services.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 229 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 57.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 229 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 57.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 229 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Frist.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate regarding Medicaid reconciliation legislation consistent with recommendations from the Secretary of Health and Human Services.
